title: Farming for the future
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Shell Company of Australia, Geoffrey Bell, Shan Benson and Geoffrey Collings
brief_description: The basic causes of wind and water erosion in Australia, and how in the Mallee areas wind erosion is being checked. Farming for the future means a new approach to old problems, since the farmers themselves suffer most from the effects of impoverished land.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board, Shell Company of Australia, Geoffrey Bell, Shan Benson and Geoffrey Collings
